# Recent Changes

- **Feb 11, 2026:** Added [Greater Assabet Individual Network](https://massgain.org), [Mass50501](https://mass50501.org).
- **Feb 14, 2026:** Added [Turn Out Pac](https://turnoutpac.org)
- **Feb 14, 2026:** Updated [parking suggestions](/parking) and [public transportation options](/public-transportation).
- **Feb 16, 2026:** Added guidelines, tips, photography info, safety, public transportation, tips for handling protestors, parking tips, and goals / what we are demanding to the [Monday/Tuesday page](/mondaytuesday)
- **Feb 16, 2026:** Added nearby events to [1000 District Ave Protests](/protests1000districtave)
- **Feb 16, 2026:** Added [Featured](/explore?cause=Featured) menu item
- **Feb 17, 2026:** Check out these new and updated resources:
    - [Parking](/parking.html) page reorganized and made mobile friendly
    - [Monday/Tuesday] page - reorganized and enhanced the page content for improved clarity and usability.
    - [Lunch Time Activism](/lunchtime.html): Join us for lunch after Mon, Tue, and Wed protests to write postcards, collate materials for immigrants, and plan future actions.  No need to buy anything.   
    - [Donate Food](/donatehere.html): Bring shelf-stable food, winter clothing, and hygiene products to Mon–Fri protests, or donate directly to Toni Matloff via Venmo or cash. Greatest needs: tea, coffee, cooking oil.
    - [ICE Out of Merrimack, Sat Feb 21](https://www.noicenh.com/current-status): Learn about and support the ICE Out of NH campaign and upcoming events.
    - [North Carolina and Texas Text Bank w/ VoteRiders (virtual)](https://www.mobilize.us/voteriders/event/893364/): Help TX and NC voters get the ID info they need for the primaries.
    - [No Kings Rally – March 28](https://www.nokings.org/): 1000 District Ave protest. Details TBD.
